description.zh-cn: 美国国会在第二次世界大战初期通过的一项法案，目的是在美国不卷入战争的同时，为同盟国提供战争物资。
description.en: An act passed by the U.S. Congress in the early stages of World War II to provide war materials to the Allied nations while the United States was not yet a belligerent.

description.zh-cn: 美国的立法机构，于1941年3月通过了《租借法案》。
description.en: The legislature of the United States, which passed the Lend-Lease Act in March 1941.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性的军事冲突，租借法案在此期间为同盟国提供了关键的物资支持。
description.en: A global military conflict during which the Lend-Lease Act provided crucial material support to the Allied nations.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战中的同盟国之一，通过租借法案成为“民主兵工厂”。
description.en: One of the Allied powers in World War II, which became the "Arsenal of Democracy" through the Lend-Lease Act.

description.zh-cn: 由美国总统罗斯福提出的概念，指美国在二战中作为同盟国主要军需品供应国的角色。
description.en: A concept promoted by U.S. President Roosevelt, referring to the role of the United States as the primary supplier of materiel for the Allied powers in World War II.

nodes.id: 乌克兰民主防卫租借法案

zh-cn: 乌克兰民主防卫租借法案
en: Ukraine Democracy Defense Lend-Lease Act of 2022

description.zh-cn: 1941年《租借法案》的更新版，旨在应对2022年俄罗斯入侵乌克兰期间，加快向乌克兰提供军事物资。
description.en: An updated version of the 1941 Lend-Lease Act, designed to expedite military aid to Ukraine during the 2022 Russian invasion.

description.zh-cn: 一场由俄罗斯发动的对乌克兰的全面军事入侵，促使美国通过了《乌克兰民主防卫租借法案》。
description.en: A full-scale military invasion of Ukraine launched by Russia, which prompted the United States to pass the Ukraine Democracy Defense Lend-Lease Act.

description.zh-cn: 美国总统，《乌克兰民主防卫租借法案》赋予其更大权力以加快对乌克兰的援助。
description.en: President of the United States, who was granted greater authority by the Ukraine Democracy Defense Lend-Lease Act to expedite aid to Ukraine.

nodes.id: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

zh-cn: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间的美国总统，是《租借法案》的主要推动者。
description.en: President of the United States during World War II and the primary advocate for the Lend-Lease Act.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战中与同盟国对立的军事联盟。
description.en: The military alliance that fought against the Allies in World War II.

description.zh-cn: 美国在1930年代通过的一系列法案，旨在防止美国卷入外国战争，对向交战国出售武器等行为施加了严格限制。
description.en: A series of acts passed by the U.S. in the 1930s to prevent involvement in foreign wars, imposing strict restrictions on selling arms to belligerent nations.

description.zh-cn: 1940年美国与英国达成的一项协议，美国向英国提供50艘驱逐舰，以换取英国在西半球部分领土的军事基地租用权。
description.en: An agreement between the United States and the United Kingdom in 1940, in which the U.S. transferred 50 destroyers to the UK in exchange for land rights on British possessions.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战中的主要同盟国之一，通过《驱逐舰换基地协议》和《租借法案》从美国获得重要军事援助。
description.en: A major Allied power in World War II that received significant military aid from the United States through the Destroyers-for-bases deal and the Lend-Lease Act.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，被罗斯福总统任命负责管理租借法案的实施。
description.en: American politician appointed by President Roosevelt to head the administration of the Lend-Lease Act.

description.zh-cn: 由英国及其前殖民地和自治领组成的国家联合体，是《租借法案》的首批及主要受益者之一。
description.en: An association of the United Kingdom and its former colonies and dominions, which was one of the first and primary beneficiaries of the Lend-Lease Act.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战中的同盟国之一，从1941年4月起通过《租借法案》获得美国援助。
description.en: One of the Allied powers in World War II, which began receiving U.S. aid through the Lend-Lease Act in April 1941.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战中的同盟国之一，从1941年10月起通过《租借法案》获得美国大量物资援助。
description.en: One of the Allied powers in World War II, which received substantial material aid from the U.S. through the Lend-Lease Act starting in October 1941.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战中的主要同盟国，是《租借法案》的最大受益国。
description.en: A major Allied power in World War II and the largest recipient of aid under the Lend-Lease Act.

description.zh-cn: 由夏尔·戴高乐在二战期间领导的法国抵抗政府，通过《租借法案》获得了美国援助。
description.en: The French government-in-exile led by Charles de Gaulle during World War II, which received U.S. aid through the Lend-Lease Act.

description.zh-cn: 二战期间连接缅甸和中国云南的战略公路，美国通过《租借法案》提供的物资协助了其修补工作。
description.en: A strategic road linking Burma and Yunnan, China during WWII, whose repair was assisted by materials provided by the U.S. under the Lend-Lease Act.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战中的轴心国成员，与苏联签有中立条约。
description.en: A member of the Axis powers during World War II, which had signed a neutrality pact with the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 苏联与日本在二战期间签订的互不侵犯条约，该条约使得苏联籍货轮能相对安全地通过太平洋航线运输租借物资。
description.en: A non-aggression pact signed between the Soviet Union and Japan during WWII, which allowed Soviet-flagged ships to transport Lend-Lease materials relatively safely via the Pacific Route.

description.zh-cn: 通过了《租借法案》，使其于1941年3月11日生效。
description.en: Passed the Lend-Lease Act, which became effective on March 11, 1941.

relationships.source: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 作为总统积极推动并最终签署了《租借法案》，使其成为法律。
description.en: As president, he actively promoted and ultimately signed the Lend-Lease Act into law.

relationships.source: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 在1940年12月的“炉边谈话”中提出“民主兵工厂”的概念，为《租借法案》提供了理论基础。
description.en: Promoted the concept of the "Arsenal of Democracy" in his December 1940 "fireside chat," providing the ideological foundation for the Lend-Lease Act.

description.zh-cn: 使得美国能够成为“民主兵工厂”，大规模向同盟国提供战争物资。
description.en: Enabled the United States to become the "Arsenal of Democracy," supplying vast quantities of war materials to the Allied nations.

relationships.source: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 在《租借法案》通过后，任命小爱德华·斯特蒂纽斯成立并管理租借法案管理办公室。
description.en: After the passage of the Lend-Lease Act, he appointed Edward Stettinius Jr. to establish and head the office administering the program.

description.zh-cn: 作为《租借法案》的主要受益国，英国获得了大量战争物资援助。
description.en: As the main beneficiary of the Lend-Lease Act, the United Kingdom received a vast amount of war material aid.

description.zh-cn: 自1941年4月起，中华民国被纳入《租借法案》适用范围，获得了美国援助。
description.en: Beginning in April 1941, the Republic of China was included under the Lend-Lease Act and received aid from the United States.

description.zh-cn: 自1941年10月起，苏联通过《租借法案》从美国获得大量战争物资。
description.en: Beginning in October 1941, the Soviet Union received large quantities of war materials from the United States through the Lend-Lease Act.

description.zh-cn: 美国通过《租借法案》提供货车、补给及铺路材料，协助修补了滇缅公路。
description.en: The United States provided trucks, supplies, and road-building materials under the Lend-Lease Act to help repair the Burma Road.

description.zh-cn: 该法案的严格限制条款（如“现购自运”）阻碍了美国在二战初期向盟国提供援助。
description.en: The act's strict provisions (such as "cash and carry") hindered the United States from providing aid to Allied nations in the early stages of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 该条约的存在使日本无法对通过太平洋航线向苏联运输美国租借物资的苏联籍船只进行实质性盘查或拦截。
description.en: The existence of this pact prevented Japan from substantially inspecting or intercepting Soviet-flagged vessels transporting U.S. Lend-Lease materials to the Soviet Union via the Pacific Route.

description.zh-cn: 自珍珠港事件后，美国正式向轴心国宣战，成为其主要敌对国。
description.en: After the attack on Pearl Harbor, the United States formally declared war on the Axis powers, becoming their main adversary.

relationships.target: 乌克兰民主防卫租借法案

description.zh-cn: 《乌克兰民主防卫租借法案》是1941年《租借法案》的更新版本，借鉴了其框架和理念。
description.en: The Ukraine Democracy Defense Lend-Lease Act is an updated version of the 1941 Lend-Lease Act, drawing on its framework and principles.

relationships.target: 乌克兰民主防卫租借法案

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯对乌克兰的入侵是促使美国制定并通过《乌克兰民主防卫租借法案》的直接原因。
description.en: The Russian invasion of Ukraine was the direct cause for the United States to create and pass the Ukraine Democracy Defense Lend-Lease Act.
